code: import*as React from'react';export default function useFocusedListeners(){var _React$useRef=React.useRef([]),listeners=_React$useRef.current;var addListener=React.useCallback(function(listener){listeners.push(listener);return function(){var index=listeners.indexOf(listener);listeners.splice(index,1);};},[listeners]);return{listeners:listeners,addListener:addListener};}
